content: {A害羞冒烟}Well, just thinkin' about it still makes me feel all embarrassed... Do you ever get <style=Highlight>really shy</style> too? I-I could show ya a lickle thing I do, if that's alright~?
info: 月下送礼-云果_主流程文本II

content: Well mah, it's my first time eatin' with so many people. I was a lickle nervous at first, but I'm real glad you all liked my congee~!
info: 月下送礼-云果_主流程文本II
